column5: I think tomorrow will be a day of fishing for me... Just wondering what everyone's plans are... I plan on being on the Upper Credit, anyone want to come along? Plans can change if someone wants to go elsewhere... I have two full outfits of flyfishing gear (except waders) if anyone wants to come... or I am willing to fish another location... anyone wanna fish! Post or msg me... I have a vehic and don't mind picking someone up'
